Reviews.Title: Got here so fast!
Reviews.Author: Paulina59
Reviews.Content: I can't review the camera yet because I just got it and I am at work.  I wanted to compliment how fast it came, though.  I just ordered it about 2 days ago and it's here already!  I looked at all the items and everything looks good, except my only complaint would be that the camera case is much too small for a bundle order.  It only fits the camera and nothing else.  But, with the price so reasonable for the items, I will go purchase a larger case.  I will re-review the product once I get it home, charge it up, and take some pictures with it.  I'm extremely excited to do so.  Again, I would suggest including a larger camera case as this one is useless for me because it will not fit the extra lenses and items.  It is a nice case (excellent quality) if you have just a small camera to put in it, so I'll save it for one of my older cameras. Thanks for the VERY fast shipping!  I would definitely recommend this seller.  I will review the actual camera in a few days.Second review of actual camera:I love the camera.  I'm a novice. It's easy to use and takes sharp, clear pictures.  You can just point and shoot if you want to or learn the other manual features.  Unfortunately, I have not had time to learn much about the other camera features, but will as time permits.  It's a great camera for someone like me... something easy to use that takes great pictures.  I did a lot of research prior to purchasing this camera and am glad I did.  The recommendations were correct.  I'm looking forward to spending more time using the additional lenses, as well.

Reviews.Title: camera is great ,extras are no good
Reviews.Author: Mark Ladago
Reviews.Content: would not ever buy the ultimate package as the 2 lenses that come with it are not compatible with the fz-200 . waste of money. i had to order a DMW-LA7 LENS ADAPTER AND A 2X converter at an extra 200.00 to get whay i wanted. the camera is great but you can have the extra stuff that doesnt work with this camera

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: G.  Kevin Hannah
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Cost more than what I wanted to pay but once I got it I loved it. It allows automatic for my wife and manual mode for me to learn and experiment with. Only thing missing is the second battery but the company said they were in short supply and will ship it once they receive their shipment.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, cheap extras
Reviews.Author: M. Rosendaul
Reviews.Content: I Love the Camera! I've done a lot of reviews about the camera and continue to be impressed with it. I should have just bought the camera by itself and hand picked the accessories I needed. Those that came in the kit are bottom rung accessories. I have a video on YT about accessories worth getting. BTW, Graham Houghton has a free ebook which is the missing manual for the camera, a must have.

Reviews.Title: worth the price
Reviews.Author: duane dundas
Reviews.Content: panasonic makes a great camera and the computer program works seemlessly. very satisfied with the product. it met my criteria.
